DOC.brief_summary: The investigator implement theory-based randomized control trial ten rural Virginia middle school 2008-2010 assessed impact health behavior include fruit/vegetable intake primary outcome . Schools randomized intervention control group . Goal setting , peer leader , in-class workshop intervention feature . The investigator expect school receive intervention report high fruit-vegetable intake compare control school student receive standard health information . Sample ( n=1,119 ) 48.5 % female , 50 % White , mean age 12.6 year . Fruit/vegetable intake significantly high intervention school immediate post 1-year follow-up compare control .
DOC.brief_title: An Intervention Targeting Fruit Vegetable Intake Among Rural Youth
